name: Blizzard
author: FlapJack
description:
Player information and latest Blizzard game patch notes in chat. Now with cool paginated patch notes you can navigate with reactions! And, Pandoc is no longer required!

Games supported:
Overwatch - Stats, patch notes
Diablo3 - Stats, patch notes
Hearthstone - patch notes
Heroes of the Storm - patch notes
Starcraft2 - patch notes
World of Warcraft - patch notes, token prices

Dependencies:
BeautifulSoup4 :: https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/bs4/doc/
Bleach :: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/bleach
install_msg: Thanks for installing FlapJack's Blizzard utilities cog. Diablo3 stats require a battle.net API key. Get one at https://dev.battle.net/.
